enWisdom: The scandal-monger is dispraised and reviled
Backbiting is the food of the dogs of hell

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ وَالْغِيبَةَ فَإِنَّهَا تُمْقِتُكَ إِلَى اللَّهِ وَالنَّاسِ وَتُحْبِطُ أَجْرَكَ
enWisdom: Beware of backbiting, for indeed it makes you hated by Allah and the people, and renders you rewards void

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تَجْعَلَ مَرْكَبَكَ لِسَانَكَ فِي غَيْبَةِ إِخْوَانِكَ أَوْ تَقُولَ مَا يَصِيرُ عَلَيْكَ حُجَّةً وَفِي الْإِسَاءَةِ إِلَيْكَ عِلَّةً
enWisdom: Beware of making your tongue a medium for slandering your brothers, or of saying that which will become proof against you and a reason for harming you
The wicked of [all] people is the backbiter
The most hated of creatures in the sight of Allah is the backbiter
Verily the mentioning of slander is the worst falsehood
The habit of vile people is ugly slander [and backbiting]
One who is fond of backbiting about others is reviled
One who narrates to you [about others] narrates [to others] about you
Slandering the righteous is one of the ugliest vile traits

Wisdom: مَا حَفِظَ غَيْبَكَ مَنْ ذَكَرَ عَيْبَكَ
enWisdom: He who mentions your faults has not guarded you in your absence

Wisdom: لَا تَذْكُرِ الْمَوْتَى بِسُوءٍ فَكَفَى بِذَلِكَ إِثْماً
enWisdom: Do not remember the dead negatively [by recalling their bad actions] for this suffices as a sin

Wisdom: لَا تُعَوِّدْ نَفْسَكَ الْغِيبَةَ فَإِنَّ مُعْتَادَهَا عَظِيمُ الْجُرْمِ
enWisdom: Do not accustom yourself to backbiting, for indeed being accustomed to it is a great sin

Wisdom: لَا دِينَ لِمُرْتَابٍ وَلَا مُرُوَّةَ لِمُغْتَابٍ
enWisdom: The sceptic has no religion and the backbiter has no magnanimity
There is no shamelessness like fabricating lies
Even a little slander is calumny
